beau can introduce you to 13 people at NBC News

We are a full HD production company specializing in network news, magazine, commercial and documentary style programming.  We currently handle productions  ranging from a multi-cam show on the Discovery Networks to Agency work handling commercial production for national campaigns. You may have seen our work on CBS, ABC, Velocity, Yahoo! and the BBC as well as many others.

I work as a Producer and Shooter for ABC Network News. I mostly cover the Southwest and work as assigned out of the LA Bureau. I've traveled all over North America shooting and producing stories for Good Morning America, 20/20, Nightline and World News.
Special Projects Producer/Cameraman.  Produced content for broadcast as well as multiple platforms - helping make 11pm news #1 in market during my tenure.
Member of award winning Investigative Unit.
I also worked in local television through the years in:- Phoenix, AZ- Memphis, TN- Albuquerque, NM- Chattanooga, TN- Roswell, NM

I am on the Governing and Corporate board for a Tri-Lingual Immersion School - teaching Spanish, Mandarin and English. As a Charter school we are tasked with creating both a curriculum and an operational plan and putting it into action.

summary: With over 20 years experience, I have a very diverse background in video production. My work has been seen on every major network as both a shooter and producer, and featured on programs such as ABC's Nightline, CBS's 48 Hours and Sunday Morning as well as shows on Discovery, History, Velocity and numerous documentaries for clients like the BBC, CNN, NFL Network, ITN and PBS. Add to that an ever-growing network of commercial and corporate clients ranging from Scripps Howard, Microsoft, Arizona Super Bowl, Arizona State University and others, I have acquired the knowledge to tackle any project from a new, creative point of view. My work has won 11 regional Emmy Awards, having been nominated twice for the national awards and received the honor of 'Photographer of the Year" from the National Press Photographers Association for the Western U.S. region.From ENG to film style production, I am comfortable with the entire spectrum of cameras available today. Staying on the cutting edge of camera technology by being the first owner/operator in Arizona of both the Sony F65 and prior to that the Sony PDW-700 XDCam is very important to me. With an extensive knowledge of both field and post production workflows, I am able to provide insight and expert support during the course of your entire project.
name: beau beyerle
title: Owner/Director at MediaHouse HD
